name: Onyx
body:
### Introduction

Current version: '0.0.1' 

Small scrapping framework on develpment, still on the works to implement asyncio, scrappers, batch jobs, console and other stuff.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Intended improvements



### Authors and Contributors
This framework was first developed on 2013 by Ernesto Bossi (@bossiernesto) and it's on process of rewrite for python 3, with some improvements.

### Support or Contact
Contact me at bossi_ernesto@yahoo.com.ar .
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
